label: TradeProductCertification
comment: The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.

datatypeProperties.comment: A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
An assertion, expressed as text, for this animal certification.
A code specifying an assertion for this specified certification, such as a claim that a product is free of hazardous chemicals.
A reference to a physical location or place.
A responsible agency, expressed as text, for this specified certification.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
A standard, expressed as text, for this specified certification.

referencedBy.comment: The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
